header.title: Salary Calculators by Country
header.subtitle: Compare take-home pay across 15+ countries worldwide

intro.paragraph1: Understanding how your salary translates across different countries is essential for international job opportunities, expatriate assignments, and global career planning. Our country-specific salary calculators help you compare take-home pay, tax burdens, and living costs worldwide.
intro.paragraph2: Each calculator is customized for local tax laws, currency, and benefit structures, ensuring accurate calculations for informed decision-making.
